skin.title: NAVER Green B형 Wiki 모바일 스킨
Wiki NAVER Green B型 移动皮肤
Wiki nGreen Mobile Skin
skin.description: 皮肤整体色调以绿色为主，显示出沉稳大方，方便用户查看wiki的内容。 NHN (developers@xpressengine.com)
The skin utilizes green as the basic color, employs a concise wiki layout style, make users easy to read wiki contents. NHN (developers@xpressengine.com)
